label: localeInfo
comment: Locale information corresponding to this observation.

label: marketID
comment: The unique ID referring to the agricultural market establishment corresponding to this observation

label: marketName
comment: Name of the market corresponding to this observation

label: commodityName
comment: The  name of the commodity corresponding to this observation.

label: commodityCode
comment: The unique code of the commodity corresponding to this observation.

label: commodityNameICC
comment: The name of the commodity corresponding to this observation as given by the ICC (Indicative Crop Classification).

label: commodityCodeICC
comment: The unique code assigned to the commodity corresponding to this observation as given by the ICC (Indicative Crop Classification).

label: commodityVarietyName
comment: Variety name of the commodity corresponding to this observation.

label: commodityVarietyCode
comment: The unique code assigned to the variety of a commodity corresponding to this observation.

label: arrivalQuantity
comment: The quantity of commodity arrived at the market corresponding to this observation.

label: tradedQuantity
comment: The total quantity of commodity that has been traded in the market corresponding to this observation.

label: maximumPrice
comment: The maximum price of the product/commodity/service corresponding to this observation.

label: minimumPrice
comment: The minimum price of the product/commodity/service corresponding to this observation.

label: modalPrice
comment: The most frequent pricing/modal price of the product/commodity/service corresponding to this observation.

label: commodityDescription
comment: The detailed description of the commodity or product corresponding to this observation.
